statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + x - 5 , -5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 3 , -11 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 10 , 2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 4 , -4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
